title: Camille vs Morde
body:
morde Ap top 7 sec Ult with stat theif tank,  vs Camille ad bruiser with 2.5 sec ult aa buff??? Balance

2.5 seconds ? FUCk I want 4 seconds to stomp that character into the ground once I hit 6 first make them buy a stupid fukn qss

The kits bullshitttttt
Poop on em in lane just gets damage  anyhow and face tanks.  Lvl 1 has 2 damage abilites .

Kits bad
Kitsbad
Kits unhealthy
Kits unhealthy
Player has to actually afk to lose  or play it at support ðŸ˜‘
